com.link_intersystems.swing.text

Class TextTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.link_intersystems.swing.text.TextTable

  • public class TextTable
extends Object
    Prints a table based on a TableModel. In addition to a TableModel you can set an optional title setTitle(String). 
     +--------------------------------------+
 | Title                                |
 +------------+------------+------------+
 | A          | B          | C          |
 +------------+------------+------------+
 | A1         | B1         | C1         |
 +------------+------------+------------+
 | A2         | B2         | C2         |
 +------------+------------+------------+
    Author:
    Ren√© Link <rene.link@link-intersystems.com>
